origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InsuranceAPI.get_customer_service_report', 'description': 'This function retrieves the latest customer service quality report for a specified year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'reportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of report, e.g., quality, satisfaction.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which the report is requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'The customer service quality report for the specified year.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InsuranceAPI.get_customer_service_report, 它的参数输入如下: 'reportType'是'quality', 'year'是'2023'.
